title: Not Receiving Chests
body:
Hey guys,
The past 2 matches, and others previously, my team members have received S ranks for their champs and I have not been getting them for the champs I have been playing. Most of these incidents have occured in ARAM, and I believe one or two times in solo queue.

Just to clarify, all the times this has happened I have been playing with champs that I own, and I have yet to earn any chests from matches this season.

replies.body: Are your teammates in a premade with you? You won't get chests from your teammates S ranks if they're just randoms, it has to be you or someone in your premade group.
Thanks for clarifying that! Somehow I thought that it would work with randoms, that is completely my mistake. That answers my inquiry perfectly, thank you so much!

You do need to own the champion you played in order to get a chest from that game, but there are a few [**other requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) as well. You can only get up to 4 chests per week, and each time you get one it will take a week for that chest slot to reopen. you can see how long it will be until you can get another chest on your profile page.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/article_attachments/115008356007/Chest-Availability.jpg

im play normal my team 1 have S (S+ S-) have key or key flagment not have chest.how to give chest hextech i want open new skin & champions flagment blue essence orange essence :( {{item:3070}}  {{item:3070}}
I understand that, and thanks for clarifying, but I haven't earned a single chest this season even though I am playing champs that I own in matches where my teammates are earning 'S' ranks.

Oooooh.....well that's strange. If you own those champions but still haven't been getting any chests at all, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). That way we'll be able to dig a little deeper to see what's going on with your hextech loot!
Thanks for the response, I will definitely do that.
